footer.content:
iPrice Group Sdn Bhd

questions.title: Why should I vote?
questions.content: If you are reading this, chances are that you’re already enjoying the convenience of e-commerce shopping. By voting at the iPrice E-Commerce Awards 2017, you can show your support for your favorite e-commerce stores and merchants – as well as giving yourself the chance to win a Samsung Smartphone!

questions.title: How do I vote?
questions.content: Visit the iEMA 2017 website and you will be able to submit an entry for your favorite e-commerce merchant. You will also be able to submit entries for the iPrice Special Award.

questions.title: How do I qualify for the Samsung smartphone lucky draw?
questions.content: Any person submitting an entry for the iEMA 2017 will qualify for the lucky draw. As for the iPrice Special Award, individuals will only qualify if they fill in the email column when submitting an entry.

questions.title: How do I enlist my e-commerce business for the iEMA voting & judging sessions?
questions.content: The awards are open to all e-commerce merchants in the Southeast Asia region. If your business does not automatically show up on the TrustedCompany voting form, email award@ipricegroup.com to enter the competition.

questions.title: When is the voting & judging period?
Can I incentivize my customers to vote for me?
questions.content: We encourage you to get your customers involved with any form of support such as through the use of newsletters, social media, and banners. You are also allowed to incentivize your customers, e.g. running a lucky draw. However, it is not allowed to manipulate their opinion on your services.

questions.title: How will finalists and winners be chosen?
questions.content:
• The merchant with the highest number of votes will win “The Most Popular E-Commerce Merchant of the Year 2017” award for each country.
  • The merchant with the highest average ranking will win “The Highest Quality E-Commerce Merchant of the Year 2017” award for each country.

questions.title: What would I gain by participating in iEMA?
questions.content: Winners and finalists will receive a digital certificate and an e-badget that can be placed on their e-commerce websites. There will also be strong PR coverage throughout the entire period of the iEMA by iPrice to garner more publicity; should your business be one of the winners or finalists of the iEMA, you will receive mentions in the press materials and other publicity activities.

questions.title: Is my e-commerce business allowed to participate in all three (Most Popular Merchant, High Quality Merchant and iPrice Special Award) categories?
questions.content: Yes. After receiving the first vote, you will automatically enter both the popularity and quality awards. However, your entry into the iPrice Special Awards is only active when somebody nominates your company.

questions.title: Where will the votes, reviews, & rankings be displayed, and where is it stored?
questions.content: The votes and reviews will be stored and kept safe with TrustedCompany.com. The data collected is stored in secured servers that are constantly updated with the latest software to prevent illegal access. There will be no rankings of e-commerce businesses displayed on iEMA website.

questions.title: How I can be sure that my business’ reputation will not be jeopardized by the iEMA 2017?
questions.content: TrustedCompany.com will be collecting the votes and reviews for the duration of iEMA 2017. They have a team that is dedicated to monitoring all votes and reviews that are logged in, thus preventing any fake reviews from appearing on their database.

questions.title: What happens if I score badly on the iEMA?
questions.content: Participants are encouraged to publicize the iEMA to garner support from your loyal customers to ensure that the reviews are well reflecting experience of you customers. Low-ranked e-commerce businesses will not be publicized in any communication.
